column7: Unique identifier for the analysis performed for a particular set of samples
Unique identifier for the analyzed sample
Unique identifier for the analyzed control sample
Platform or technology used in detecting the methylation
Name of experimental protocol and URL to written protocol
Name of base calling algorithm and URL to written protocol
Name of alignment algorithm and URL to written protocol
Name of variation calling algorithm and URL to written protocol
Names of other analysis algorithms. Separate multiple algorithms by commas.
Public repository where raw data is submitted
Accession and URL for referencing the raw data at the public repository
